title: The $1,000-an-Hour Lawyer Moonlights as Energy Healer
author: Michael Corkery
description: By day, Kenneth Klee inhabits the legal world of high-stakes bankruptcy cases. At night, he holds energy healings at his home, and says he can talk to spirits, mend broken bodies and wounded souls and, if necessary, perform exorcisms.
cleaned_text: Updated Aug. 27, 2013 1:31 am ET LOS ANGELES—Kenneth Klee's longtime law partner had spent weeks in the summer of 2010 typing up a voluminous report on the Tribune Co. bankruptcy, and his hands ached.
